description: Enterprise techniques used by APT16, ATT&CK group G0023 v1.0
name: APT16 (G0023)

techniques.comment: [APT16](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0023) spearphished journalists, apparently targeting those interested in contact information for DPP members or politicians.

techniques.techniqueName: Compromise 3rd party infrastructure to support delivery
techniques.comment: [APT16](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0023) has compromised otherwise legitimate sites as staging servers for second-stage payloads.
